10 namespace vistle {
11 
12 template <typename T, int Dim=1>
13 class Vec: public DataBase {
14  V_OBJECT(Vec);
15 
16  static const int MaxDim = MaxDimension;
17  static_assert(Dim > 0, "only positive Dim allowed");
18  static_assert(Dim <= MaxDim, "Dim too large");
19 
20  public:
21  typedef DataBase Base;
22  typedef typename shm<T>::array array;
23  typedef T Scalar;
24  typedef VistleVector<Scalar,Dim> Vector;
25 
26  Vec(const Index size,
27  const Meta &meta=Meta());
28 
29  Index getSize() const override {
30  return (Index)(d()->x[0]->size());
31  }
32 
33  void resetArrays() override;
34  void setSize(const Index size) override;
35  void applyDimensionHint(Object::const_ptr grid) override;
36  void setExact(bool exact) override;
37 
38  array &x(int c=0) { return *d()->x[c]; }
39  array &y() { assert(Dim > 1); return Dim>1 ? *d()->x[1] : x(); }
40  array &z() { assert(Dim > 2); return Dim>2 ? *d()->x[2] : x(); }
41  array &w() { assert(Dim > 3); return Dim>3 ? *d()->x[3] : x(); }
42 
43  const T *x(int c=0) const { return m_x[c]; }
44  const T *y() const { assert(Dim > 1); return Dim>1 ? m_x[1] : x(); }
45  const T *z() const { assert(Dim > 2); return Dim>2 ? m_x[2] : x(); }
46  const T *w() const { assert(Dim > 3); return Dim>3 ? m_x[3] : x(); }
47 
48  void updateInternals() override;
49  std::pair<Vector, Vector> getMinMax() const;
50 
51  private:
52  mutable const T *m_x[MaxDim];
53  mutable Index m_size;
54 
55  public:
56  struct Data: public Base::Data {
57 
58  Vector min;
59  Vector max;
60  ShmVector<T> x[Dim];
61  // when used as Vec
62  Data(const Index size = 0, const std::string &name = "",
63  const Meta &meta=Meta());
64  // when used as base of another data structure
65  Data(const Index size, Type id, const std::string &name,
66  const Meta &meta=Meta());
67  Data(const Data &other, const std::string &name, Type id=UNKNOWN);
68  Data(Object::Type id, const std::string &name, const Meta &meta);
69  static Data *create(Index size=0, const Meta &meta=Meta());
70  static Data *createNamed(Object::Type id, const std::string &name, const Meta &meta=Meta());
71 
72  protected:
73  void setExact(bool exact);
74 
75  private:
76  friend class Vec;
77  ARCHIVE_ACCESS
78  template<class Archive>
79  void serialize(Archive &ar);
80  void initData();
81  void updateBounds();
82  void invalidateBounds();
83  bool boundsValid() const;
84  };
85 };

87 #define V_VEC_TEMPLATE(ValueType) \
88  extern template class V_COREEXPORT Vec<ValueType,1>; \
89  extern template class V_COREEXPORT Vec<ValueType,2>; \
90  extern template class V_COREEXPORT Vec<ValueType,3>; \
91  extern template class V_COREEXPORT Vec<ValueType,4>;
92 V_VEC_TEMPLATE(unsigned char)
93 V_VEC_TEMPLATE(int32_t)
